query:
SELECT 
  DAYNAME(entryTime) as day_of_week,
  DAYOFWEEK(entryTime) as day_num,
  COUNT(*) as trade_count,
  SUM(pnlCents) / 100 as total_pnl
FROM trades
WHERE entryTime IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY DAYNAME(entryTime), DAYOFWEEK(entryTime)
ORDER BY DAYOFWEEK(entryTime);
